name: Easy Game
description:
Clear the stage through multiple obstacles to your goal!

It is a game that avoids obstacles and catches and clears the boss through simple operations consisting of movement, jump, and attack.

It's okay if multiple traps and obstacles pop out and fall to death! There's a save point!

There are many easy and fun obstacles!

Get out of the way! Start over, move on!
The many obstacles we have prepared, I'm sure it will be fun!
